channel.title: Custom Item Help
channel.description: Well Im trying to add Custom Items from a servers client for PC's Over to my Mac client I got the class8.java and all the models and yet it wtill wont seem to load the item correctly heres a screen to show what i mean [IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo163/Chrisitan4LIFE/Picture35-1.png[/img] it should look like a skillcape with wings comming out of it NOTE: this works on the PC Client but not for the mac client so idk whats wrong please help me thx

item.title: Custom Item Help
item.dc:creator: @S_I_N_N_E_R S I N N E R
item.description:
@S_I_N_N_E_R wrote:

Make sure the drop model and the wear model numbers arent over 15000, this can usually cause a malfunction in the item =\

Read full topic

at this point i have no idea what is going wrong because 50% of the customs dont work and yet another 50% do =\
